alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 5:12PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM MOVING THROUGH THE URBAN CORE OF HOUSTON... At 512 PM CST, broadcast media reported a strong thunderstorm over University Place, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Pasadena, Deer Park, Bellaire, West University Place, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Midtown Houston, Cloverleaf, Downtown Houston, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Second Ward, Neartown / Montrose, Greater Eastwood, Near Northside Houston, Greater Fifth Ward, Memorial Park, Greater Third Ward, Fourth Ward, University Place, and Astrodome Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
